ComicInfo.Summary:
BEOWULF - PART TWO
As Wulf defends his new friends from a horrific creature, an even more dangerous foe rises. At this most dire hour, Wulf is on his own and without the help of those at Arcane Acre. Will he stand up and embrace the hero within, or meet an early death at the hands of a monster that has killed men ten times as powerful as him? Find out in the conclusion of Grimm Fairy Tales' much anticipated Beowulf storyline!
